entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [CS8629]: LINQ .Where calls are not considered #57757
  • Unexpected behavior when compiling a project with an error from the roslyn analyzer #57357
    17.1

Updated

  • .NET 6 release broke switch expression formatting #57736
  • Invalid parsing of interpolated strings with curly braces followed after interpolation with format specifier #57750

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #57756
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/snappy/nodelay #57755
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #57754
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Updated

  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Don't show nullable annotation in completion items of static field/property #57744
    Area-IDE
  • Add test from PR 50799 for impl PR 56853 #57752
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Ignore function types in return type inference #57713
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
